Name: Crate Knight
About the game: One day, the kingdom wakes up to a morning in which all inner chambers' gates are locked and their keys vanish. The kingdom chooses the Lancelot to find all keys and unlock all locked gates. As the Lancelot, use the crates and solve the puzzles for unlocking all the gates. -- FEATURES -- - Play through 25 unique stages. - Physics based puzzles. - Challenging collectables to collect. - Multiple methods to solve each puzzle. -- KEY BINDINGS -- E - Interact R - Restart Scene A-D / Left-Right Arrows - Movement Space - Jump Ctrl - Grab ESC - Pause
